edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.frontend

Class DirUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.frontend.DirUtils

  • public class DirUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for getting files from a directory or OMERO data source and matching them together into sets of the different channels of the same image.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

    • Method Detail

      • makeMultiwavelengthFileSets

        public static java.util.List<ImageSet> makeMultiwavelengthFileSets(ParameterDictionary params)
        Gets filenames of the images to be processed (either from a directory or OMERO data source), along with a display name (i.e. name without a full path) for each.
        Parameters:
        params - The ParameterDictionary containing the parameters to be used for the analysis; the data directory or OMERO data source will be pulled from here.
        Returns:
        A List containing ImageSets, one per file.

      • makeSetsOfMatchingFiles

        public static java.util.List<ImageSet> makeSetsOfMatchingFiles(ParameterDictionary params)
        Gets a list of String arrays each containing a set of filenames that correspond to image files for the color channels of a split channel image.
        Parameters:
        params - The ParameterDictionary containing the parameters for the analysis. The directory or OMERO source and channel names will be taken from here.
        Returns:
        A List containing ImageSets. Each set can load the Images for the channels of an image.
